original_title: À la poursuite de milliardaires philanthropes
overview: Why do the super rich give away some of their wealth? For two years, documentary filmmaker Jean-Luc Leon followed three female billionaires, to China, the US and Russia hoping to understand the reason behind their involvement in charities and sponsorship. Dive into the world of philanthropists, made of "self-sacrifice", power and influence.
title: À la poursuite de milliardaires philanthropes
